vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.12;
son of: Perez (H6557);
brother of: Hezron (H2696H)
Group of cha.mul (חָמוּל "Hamul" H2538)
§ Hamulites = "spared"
descendants of Hamul, grandson of Judah by Tamar
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Hamul, hijo de Fares; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈母勒族 这个種族名稱陽性名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "留下"
猶大與他瑪的孫子哈母勒的後裔(民 26:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈母勒族 这个种族名称阳性名词在希伯来文的意思是 "留下"
犹大与他玛的孙子哈母勒的后裔(民 26:21)
